about.description: Hi, I'm Arda Güner. I started my software journey with JavaScript and developed projects in modern technologies.
detailedDescription: Hi, I'm Arda Güner. I started my software journey with JavaScript and developed my skills in this field. I enjoy producing creative and effective solutions using modern web technologies. Especially, developing projects with tools in the JavaScript ecosystem like React and Node.js is both a job and a passion for me.

Thanks to Flutter and Dart, I also have experience in mobile app development. Designing user-friendly and high-performance mobile applications is one of my strongest suits. On the other hand, I am still in the learning phase with Kotlin and striving to fill my gaps in this area.
